title: June Jobs Report Shows Hiring Rebound, Watching Oil Outlook, ESG Investing Integration, Insurtech Startups
itunes:title: June Jobs Report Shows Hiring Rebound, Watching Oil Outlook, ESG Investing Integration, Insurtech Startups
description:
Former Deputy Secretary of Labor Chris Lu breaks down June nonfarm payrolls topping all economists’ estimates with a solid 224,000 jobs added, the most since January, after a disappointing 72,000 May advance. Alex Nussbaum, Bloomberg News Energy Reporter, shares his outlook for oil in the second half of 2019. Melanie Adams, Vice President & Head, Corporate Governance & Responsible Investment at RBC Global Asset Management, discusses how Environmental, Social and Governance investing is beginning to resonate with U.S. institutions. Munjal Shah, CEO at Health IQ, talks about looking for best in class startups including in the insurtech space. And we Drive to the Close with Ryan Detrick, Senior Market Strategist for LPL Financial.

Hosts: Paul Sweeney and Lisa Abarmowicz.  Producer: Paul Brennan
